text: Money in the Bank (2013) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It took place on July 14, 2013 at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. It was the fourth Money in the Bank event held by WWE. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 The Shield (Roman Reigns and Seth Rollins) (c) defeated The Usos (Jimmy and Jey Uso) Tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 14:48 2 Damien Sandow defeated Wade Barrett, Cody Rhodes, Dean Ambrose, Fandango (with Summer Rae), Jack Swagger (with Zeb Colter) and Antonio Cesaro (with Zeb Colter) Money in the Bank ladder match for a World Heavyweight Championship contract 16:25 3 Curtis Axel (c) (with Paul Heyman) defeated The Miz Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 9:08 4 AJ Lee (c) (with Big E Langston) defeated Kaitlyn (with Layla) by submission Singles match for the WWE Divas Championship 7:03 5 Ryback defeated Chris Jericho) Singles match 11:20 6 Alberto Del Rio (c) defeated Dolph Ziggler by disqualification Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 14:29 7 John Cena (c) defeated Mark Henry by submission Singles match for the WWE Championship 14:46 8 Randy Orton defeated Rob Van Dam, CM Punk, Daniel Bryan, Sheamus and Christian Money in the Bank ladder match for a WWE Championship contract 28:48 (c) – is the champion(s) going into the match P – This match took place on the pre-show ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Money in the Bank 2013 website Category:2013 in American television Category:2013 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Philadelphia Category:WWE Money in the Bank Category:2013 in the United States Category:2010s in Philadelphia
title: Money in the Bank (2013)
